# Professional Experience

## Personal Tutor

- 2019-2020 School Year 
- Assited learning of student in math foundations and applications
- Worked directly with a profesional tutor to ensure that the most helpful and effective teaching styles were being used

## Grade 8 USSF Soccer Referee

- March 2016-August 2020
- Effectively managed various players and coaches throughout the game.
- Worked collaboratively with other referees to take a team approach to managing the game.
- Mentored by various referees at the Grade 5 level and referee assigners. 


## American Wrestling Association

- [Beat Jumbo goddamn Tsuruta for AWA World Heavyweight Championship](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c3O_jGZd6EI). 
- Wrestled several matches with then-NWA World Champion Ric Flair.

## Other Territories

- Successfully teamed with Roddy Piper, winning a total of four tag team championships.
- Feature attraction in multiple territories in Canada (e.g. Stampede Wrestling), Puerto Rico (World Wrestling Council), and the United States (e.g. Georgia Championship Wrestling)
